about_the_game:
Have you ever wondered how much damage your car can take?

Will it survive a collision with a tree? How about hitting a concrete wall? Have you ever considered of the damages your vehicle might get after you slightly touch the side of another car while going 80 km/h?

Well, now you can recreate the aftermath of such an accident: cracks, rust, dents, scratches...

All this damage, plus a set of new "Sponsored" stickers, will allow you to start writing a unique history of your drift car, without limiting your imagination.

This will be the history of your car, and you're going to be its author.

More than 200 of new stickers from HIT THE WALL DLC is all you need for it.

The DLC also includes skins for:

  • Phoenix NX

  • Wütend

  • Burner JDM

  • Samurai II

  • Carrot II

Have fun!
